resources.string: Do you really want to exit Mr. Bean?
1. Cube have 3 status: follow, controlled, fixed.
2. Touch human button to change cube\'s status to follow.
3. And then touch cube button to switch cube\'s status between controlled and fixed.
4. Touch left, right, up button to control Mr. Bean to move and jump.
5. Touch dashboard button to control cube to move.
Install free app, earn remember stones.
Remember stone is used to record your game state.
